content: For the fourth quarter fiscal year 2022, the Aviat team's hard work and commitment resulted in revenue of $77.4 million, which represents growth of 8.0% versus Q4 of last year; adjusted EBITDA of $9.1 million, a 31% increase versus the same period prior year; non-GAAP EPS increase of 52%; a strong debt-free balance sheet; continued share buybacks of $0.75 million. For the full year fiscal 2022, Aviat achieved revenue growth of 10.2% to $303.0 million, which also represents our second consecutive fiscal year of double-digit top line growth; adjusted EBITDA of $38.3 million, a 17% increase over last year; non-GAAP EPS growth of 24%; repurchased $5.4 million in Aviat shares.
